title: Transformers Standalone December 2025 Net Sales at Rs 704.21 crore, up 29.14% Y-o-Y
author: Broker Research
content:
Reported Standalone quarterly numbers for Transformers and Rectifiers India are:Net Sales at Rs 704.21 crore in December 2025 up 29.14% from Rs. 545.31 crore in December 2024. Quarterly Net Profit at Rs. 71.03 crore in December 2025 up 40.63% from Rs. 50.51 crore in December 2024. EBITDA stands at Rs. 114.00 crore in December 2025 up 31.09% from Rs. 86.96 crore in December 2024. Transformers EPS has decreased to Rs. 2.37 in December 2025 from Rs. 3.39 in December 2024. Transformers shares closed at 267.50 on January 09, 2026 (NSE) and has given -47.34% returns over the last 6 months and -49.71% over the last 12 months.
